<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103261</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208975</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Talking about Sound and Music</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Befassender Ton und Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruit et musique parlants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Falar sobre o som e a música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suono e musica parlanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία για τον ήχο και τη μουσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sonido y música que hablan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For middle school and up, an introduction to some acoustics terms and how they relate to music.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für mittlere Schule und up, eine Einleitung zu 
den Bezeichnungen irgendeiner Akustik und wie sie auf Musik in 
Verbindung stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour le collège et levez, une introduction aux 
limites d'une certaine acoustique et comment ils associent à la 
musique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para a escola média e levante, uma introdução 
aos termos de alguma acústica e como se relacionam à música.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la scuola centrale ed aumenti, un'introduzione
ai termini di qualche acustica e come si riferiscono a musica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση και επάνω, μια 
εισαγωγή σε μερικούς όρους ακουστικής και πώς αφορούν τη 
μουσική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para la escuela media y suba, una introducción a 
los términos de una cierta acústica y cómo se relacionan con la 
música.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
